column5: The Black Hole sells surplus equipment acquired from the Los Alamos National Laboratories.\nThey sell everything from 1950’s era oscilloscopes to liquid nitrogen dewars, from dials, knobs & calculators to A-bomb detonator cables. It is a museum of nuclear research where everything is for sale.\nUpdate March, 2017: This business is no longer in operation.
column6: Seller of surplus nuclear research materials.
